topicTitle: OFFICIAL FAVORITE MAP(s) POLL FOR TTT

posts.postText:
vote for your fav map(s) outta the ones in the poll

doit

noone here played crummycradle?

its like a lightning bolt of epic hit your brain
crummycradle isn't great, its easily exausted and boring.

The only reason 67th way is by far the best (well actually 67th way and peachs castle are close imo.) is because u can jump cars. 

We need a car jumping contest. Last one alive wins points.
if you dont have lowgrav you get raped

>> if you dont have lowgrav you get raped 
Trololol. No, I dun haz it and I am good.
I mean u get raped if u try and jump a car witout lowgrav....

>> I mean u get raped if u try and jump a car witout lowgrav.... 

not really... u can still got lots of nice air without low grav. like i could get on top of trees b4 i got my low grav but it just hurt quit the amount missing the tree.
